title: Progress on Paddy Purchasing  Programme in 2011 Yala Season
decision_details:
- Cabinet noted the progress of the programme of purchasing paddy in the Yala Season 2011, presented by Hon. Jonston Fernando, Minister of Co-operatives and Internal Trade, giving the following details totaling to 5889 MT. as at 23.08.2011: 

		*	Polonnaruwa Region	-		1181 MT
		*	North Western Region	-		206   MT
		*	Ampara Region		-		 971  MT
		*	Anuradhapura Region	-		 436  MT
		*	Southern Region		-		 3009 MT
		*	Northern Region		-		     78 MT

	The Paddy Marketing Board expects to purchase 75,000 MT. of paddy during the 2011 Yala Season.
